description: Swiss President at Press Briefing: India & Switzerland making considerable progress in fighting tax fraud & evasion pic.twitter.com/4qOF16tS46 — Vikas Swarup (@MEAIndia) June 6, 201
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
President Schneider-Ammann and I reviewed the multifaceted bilateral ties between India & Switzerland. 

Collaboration in trade, technology, skill development, renewable energy were discussed in my meeting with President Schneider-Ammann.

Common commitments, values, people-to-people & economic ties will take India-Switzerland relations to new heights.
